 Double restricted existential quantification.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Oct-2016.)
statement:
r2exf.1 $e |- F/_ y A $.
r2exf $p |- ( E. x e. A E. y e. B ph <-> E. x E. y ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) /\ ph ) ) $.
$d x y $.
